verses.text: \w Awake|strong="H5782"\w*, \w awake|strong="H5782"\w*, \w put|strong="H3847"\w* \w on|strong="H3847"\w* \w thy|strong="H3847"\w* \w strength|strong="H5797"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*; \w put|strong="H3847"\w* \w on|strong="H3847"\w* \w thy|strong="H3847"\w* \w beautiful|strong="H8597"\w* garments, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w henceforth|strong="H3254"\w* there \w shall|strong="H5892"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H3254"\w* \w come|strong="H5892"\w* \w into|strong="H5892"\w* thee \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w uncircumcised|strong="H6189"\w* \w and|strong="H3389"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w*.

\w Shake|strong="H5287"\w* \w thyself|strong="H3427"\w* \w from|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H6965"\w* \w dust|strong="H6083"\w*; \w arise|strong="H6965"\w*, \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* \add on thy throne\add*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*: \w loose|strong="H6605"\w* \w thyself|strong="H3427"\w* \w from|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H6965"\w* \w bonds|strong="H4147"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w thy|strong="H6965"\w* \w neck|strong="H6677"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w captive|strong="H7628"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w Ye|strong="H3808"\w* \w were|strong="H3068"\w* \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w nought|strong="H2600"\w*; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w ye|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w redeemed|strong="H1350"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w My|strong="H3588"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w went|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w at|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w into|strong="H3381"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w sojourn|strong="H1481"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*: \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Assyrian \w hath|strong="H3069"\w* \w oppressed|strong="H6231"\w* \w them|strong="H3381"\w* \w without|strong="H3588"\w* \w cause|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w therefore|strong="H6258"\w*, \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w here|strong="H6311"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w seeing|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* \w away|strong="H3947"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w nought|strong="H2600"\w*? \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w rule|strong="H4910"\w* \w over|strong="H4910"\w* \w them|strong="H3947"\w* \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w howl|strong="H3213"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w continually|strong="H8548"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w blasphemed|strong="H5006"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w my|strong="H3045"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w shall|strong="H5971"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w my|strong="H3045"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*: \w therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \add they shall know\add* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H2005"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w doth|strong="H5971"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w*; \w behold|strong="H2005"\w*, \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w How|strong="H4100"\w* \w beautiful|strong="H2896"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* bringeth \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w tidings|strong="H1319"\w*, \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w publisheth|strong="H8085"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*, \w that|strong="H8085"\w* bringeth \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w tidings|strong="H1319"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*, \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w publisheth|strong="H8085"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*, \w that|strong="H8085"\w* saith \w unto|strong="H8085"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, \w Thy|strong="H8085"\w* God \w reigneth|strong="H4427"\w*!

\w The|strong="H7200"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w watchmen|strong="H6822"\w*! \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w lift|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, \w together|strong="H3162"\w* \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w sing|strong="H7442"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w eye|strong="H5869"\w*, \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w returneth|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*.

\w Break|strong="H6476"\w* \w forth|strong="H6476"\w* \w into|strong="H6476"\w* \w joy|strong="H7442"\w*, \w sing|strong="H7442"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*, ye \w waste|strong="H2723"\w* \w places|strong="H2723"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w hath|strong="H3068"\w* \w comforted|strong="H5162"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w hath|strong="H3068"\w* \w redeemed|strong="H1350"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

\w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w hath|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H3068"\w* \w bare|strong="H2834"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w arm|strong="H2220"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ends \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Depart|strong="H5493"\w* \w ye|strong="H3318"\w*, \w depart|strong="H5493"\w* \w ye|strong="H3318"\w*, \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w ye|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w thence|strong="H5375"\w*, \w touch|strong="H5060"\w* \w no|strong="H5375"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* \w thing|strong="H3627"\w*; \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w ye|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w her|strong="H5375"\w*; \w cleanse|strong="H1305"\w* \w yourselves|strong="H8033"\w*, \w ye|strong="H3318"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w ye|strong="H6440"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w haste|strong="H2649"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w ye|strong="H6440"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w flight|strong="H4499"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*; \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* rearward.

\w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w my|strong="H5375"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w shall|strong="H5650"\w* \w deal|strong="H3966"\w* \w wisely|strong="H7919"\w*, \w he|strong="H2009"\w* \w shall|strong="H5650"\w* \w be|strong="H5650"\w* \w exalted|strong="H7311"\w* \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w lifted|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w*, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w shall|strong="H5650"\w* \w be|strong="H5650"\w* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w high|strong="H7311"\w*.

\w Like|strong="H3651"\w* \w as|strong="H3651"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w astonished|strong="H8074"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* thee (\w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w visage|strong="H4758"\w* \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w marred|strong="H4893"\w* \w more|strong="H7227"\w* \w than|strong="H5921"\w* any \w man|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w form|strong="H8389"\w* \w more|strong="H7227"\w* \w than|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w*),

\w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w shall|strong="H1471"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w sprinkle|strong="H5137"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*; \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w shall|strong="H1471"\w* \w shut|strong="H7092"\w* \w their|strong="H8085"\w* \w mouths|strong="H6310"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w which|strong="H1471"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w been|strong="H3808"\w* \w told|strong="H5608"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H1471"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w*; \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w which|strong="H1471"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w shall|strong="H1471"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w understand|strong="H8085"\w*.
